translator
Class JavaScope

java.lang.Object
  xtc.tree.Visitor
      translator.JavaScope
Direct Known Subclasses:
JavaBlock, JavaStatement, JavaVisibleScope
public class JavaScope
extends xtc.tree.Visitor

Handles anything that can have its own scope, from a File to a Block.

Field Detail

pkg

private java.lang.String pkg
The name of the package. We include this in all scopes so that we don't have to climb the tree when printing: we can just directly reference it here.

scope

private JavaScope scope
The scope that this scope is in (ie the parent scope).

fields

private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,JavaField> fields
List of all fields in this scope.

onInstantiate

A nice, little call-back for when something is constructed. Just in case classes need to do something without intercepting the constructor.
